name: com.vimaster.unitydatabinding
description: This package allows data-binding between components using a JSON blob called a Document.

samples.description: This scene contains a Document and, using an AutomatedSubscriber, automatically updates the position of a Unity-internal UI Text component.
This scene uses an EventGenerator which makes interactive UI elements (like UnityEngine.UI.Button) automatically send their events to the Document for others to subscribe to.

samples.displayName: Subscribe and set values using C#
samples.description: This scene contains a Document and manually sets and subscribes to changes inside a Document using C#.

samples.displayName: Automatically generate and update Prefab instances using arrays
samples.description: This scene contains a Document and a PrefabGenerator.  Based on the array at the specified Path, the PrefabGenerator automatically generates, updates or deletes instances of a Prefab.
This scene contains a Document and a debugger which dumps the entire JSON Document to an on-screen label.
